title: Taylor Swift Did Not Make It To Democrat Event, But Her Songs Did
content: Taylor Swift may have been absent from the Democratic National Convention (DNC), but her presence was still felt through her music.
summary: Taylor Swift may have been absent from the Democratic National Convention (DNC), but her presence was still felt through her music.

title: 'Nostradamus' Of US Polls Says Robert Kennedy Jr's Exit Will Help Harris
content: The historian will make the official prediction for the 2024 White House race after the Democratic convention.
summary: The historian will make the official prediction for the 2024 White House race after the Democratic convention.

title: Choose Leader Who Values 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam': Hindu Priest To Democrats
content: On the third day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, the chants of "Om Shanti, Shanti" echoed in the hall and the priest conducting the prayers urged Americans to choose a leader who believes in the concept of 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam'.
summary: On the third day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, the chants of "Om Shanti, Shanti" echoed in the hall and the priest conducting the prayers urged Americans to choose a leader who believes in the concept of 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam'.

title: Tim Walz's Son, Who Has Learning Disorder, Star At Democrat Event
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz's son, Gus, stole the spotlight today as his father accepted the vice presidential nomination at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
summary: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz's son, Gus, stole the spotlight today as his father accepted the vice presidential nomination at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Robert Kennedy Jr To Quit US Presidential Race, Will Support Trump: Report
content: Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is expected to drop out of the race for the White House, US media reported on Wednesday, with the independent candidate due to make a major address later in the week.
summary: Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is expected to drop out of the race for the White House, US media reported on Wednesday, with the independent candidate due to make a major address later in the week.

title: "Our Party Acts Like A Cult": Anti-Trump Republicans At Democrat Event
content: While Democratic luminaries including the Obamas enthusiastically support Kamala Harris for US president at their party's convention, an unlikely band of rebels is joining the effort: Republicans urging fellow conservatives to ditch Donald Trump.
summary: While Democratic luminaries including the Obamas enthusiastically support Kamala Harris for US president at their party's convention, an unlikely band of rebels is joining the effort: Republicans urging fellow conservatives to ditch Donald Trump.

title: Democratic Convention's TV Ratings Beat Donald Trump-Led Republican Event
content: DNC's maiden night averaged 20 million viewers across 13 networks on Monday, comfortably surpassing the audience for the first three days of the RNC held last month in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
summary: DNC's maiden night averaged 20 million viewers across 13 networks on Monday, comfortably surpassing the audience for the first three days of the RNC held last month in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

title: China Man Awaiting Sex Surgery Sues Hospital Over Electric Shock Therapy
content: In China, having a sex change procedure is viewed as disrespectful to parents.
summary: In China, having a sex change procedure is viewed as disrespectful to parents.

title: Australian Penguin Dies, Ending Famous "Same-Sex Power Couple"
content: A celebrated Australian penguin famous for raising chicks as part of an unlikely same-sex couple has died, a Sydney aquarium said on Thursday.
summary: A celebrated Australian penguin famous for raising chicks as part of an unlikely same-sex couple has died, a Sydney aquarium said on Thursday.

title: Watch: Kamala Harris Dials Running Mate Tim Walz Before His "Special Night"
content: Ahead of his big night on the third day of the Democratic National Convention, US presidential candidate Kamala Harris gave a pep talk to his running mate Tim Walz.
summary: Ahead of his big night on the third day of the Democratic National Convention, US presidential candidate Kamala Harris gave a pep talk to his running mate Tim Walz.

title: Om Shanti Chants At Democratic Convention As Hindu Priest Opens Day 3
content: Chants of "Om Shanti Shanti" reverberated across the hall as a Hindu priest began proceedings on day 3 of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
summary: Chants of "Om Shanti Shanti" reverberated across the hall as a Hindu priest began proceedings on day 3 of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Taylor Swift Filled With "Fear, Guilt" After Vienna Concert Terror Threat
content: Pop megastar Taylor Swift on Wednesday broke her silence about the cancellation of three Vienna concerts over an alleged suicide attack plot, saying the incident filled her with "fear" and "guilt."
summary: Pop megastar Taylor Swift on Wednesday broke her silence about the cancellation of three Vienna concerts over an alleged suicide attack plot, saying the incident filled her with "fear" and "guilt."

title: US Woman Jailed For 11 Years For Killing Man Who Allegedly Abused Her
content: A 24-year-old woman in the United States has been sentenced to 11 years in prison after pleading guilty to second-degree reckless homicide in the killing of a man who she said trafficked her as a teenager.
summary: A 24-year-old woman in the United States has been sentenced to 11 years in prison after pleading guilty to second-degree reckless homicide in the killing of a man who she said trafficked her as a teenager.

title: Senior US Officials Meet With Dalai Lama In New York
content: Senior officials from the U.S. State Department and the White House met with the Dalai Lama in New York on Wednesday and "reaffirmed the U.S. commitment to advancing the human rights of Tibetans," the State Department said.
summary: Senior officials from the U.S. State Department and the White House met with the Dalai Lama in New York on Wednesday and "reaffirmed the U.S. commitment to advancing the human rights of Tibetans," the State Department said.

title: Musk's Neuralink Reports Successful 2nd Implant Trial, No Thread Issues
content: Elon Musk's brain technology startup Neuralink said its implant, designed to allow paralyzed patients to use digital devices by thinking alone, is working well in a second trial patient.
summary: Elon Musk's brain technology startup Neuralink said its implant, designed to allow paralyzed patients to use digital devices by thinking alone, is working well in a second trial patient.

title: Amid Rising Tensions, US Aircraft Carrier Arrives In Middle East
content: The USS Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier and accompanying destroyers have arrived in the Middle East, the US military said Wednesday, after the country's defense secretary ordered the strike group to accelerate its speed.
summary: The USS Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier and accompanying destroyers have arrived in the Middle East, the US military said Wednesday, after the country's defense secretary ordered the strike group to accelerate its speed.

title: Trump Stands Behind Bulletproof Glass In 1st Outdoor Rally Since Shooting
content: Donald Trump held his first outdoor campaign event on Wednesday since an assassination attempt, lobbing insults at his surging Democratic opponent Kamala Harris from behind bulletproof glass at a rally in the battleground state of North Carolina.
summary: Donald Trump held his first outdoor campaign event on Wednesday since an assassination attempt, lobbing insults at his surging Democratic opponent Kamala Harris from behind bulletproof glass at a rally in the battleground state of North Carolina.

title: Highlights: Democratic Vice Presidential Candidate Tim Walz Accepts Nomination
content: The 2024 Democratic National Convention continues today with Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, the running mate of Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris, set to deliver the keynote address.
summary: The 2024 Democratic National Convention continues today with Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, the running mate of Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris, set to deliver the keynote address.

title: "Honour Of My Life": Democrats' Vice President Pick Accepts Nomination
content: Tim Walz, Governor from Minnesota, has accepted his nomination to be Kamala Harris' White House running mate in a keynote address at the Democratic Convention.
summary: Tim Walz, Governor from Minnesota, has accepted his nomination to be Kamala Harris' White House running mate in a keynote address at the Democratic Convention.

title: Biden Spoke To Netanyahu On Gaza Truce: White House
content: US President Joe Biden called Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday as Gaza ceasefire talks between Israel and Hamas stumble, the White House said.
summary: US President Joe Biden called Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday as Gaza ceasefire talks between Israel and Hamas stumble, the White House said.
